subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If Bernie Williams really believes he can still play, why doesn’t he go to a city where he may be surprised at how energizing it is to, as Mike Piazza puts it, “re-prove yourself” in a different environment?
snippet: If Bernie Williams really believes he can still play, why doesn’t he go to a city where he may be surprised at how energizing it is to, as Mike Piazza puts it, “re-prove yourself” in a different environment?
